this is called when there is a mesh instance range.

virtual bool GrSceneTraverser::OnNode ( const MAABox &  box  )  [pure virtual]

these methods should return true if children should be traversed. This is called for BSP splits and models when traversing the scene. It is abstracted out to allow for alteration of the BSP-tree and the model higherarchy.
